JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Auto-body Shop Painter jobs available in Aarhus
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Type of employment: permanent
Location: 8000 Aarhus
Starting date: as soon as possible

Job description
Auto-body Shop Painters needed in Aarhus, Denmark. Interested candidates are encouraged to apply by sending their application or calling +45 88448244 during our office hours: Monday-Thursday 9:00-15:00 and Friday 9:00-13:00.

Job duties and responsibilities

  • Prepare vehicle surfaces for painting, including sanding, filling, and masking.

  • Mix and apply primers, base coats, and clear coats according to specifications.

  • Operate spray guns and other painting equipment with precision and efficiency.

  • Ensure proper color matching and achieve a smooth, even finish.

  • Maintain a clean and organized work area.

  • Adhere to safety regulations and best practices.

Job requirements

  • Minimum 2-3 years of documented experience as an auto-body shop painter.

  • Strong understanding of surface preparation techniques and paint application methods.

  • Proficient in using spray guns and related equipment.

  • Keen eye for detail and a commitment to quality workmanship.

  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

  • English skills: medium level required

Qualifications

  • Driver's license required: B or BE recommended 

Salary and benefits

  • Hourly gross salary: starting from 175.00 kr./hour + 11.00% in bonuses.

  • Accommodation and transportation to work: provided if needed.

  • Eurojob Denmark may provide assistance for registration to SIRI, SKAT, BorgerService, and all the other authorities, free of charge.
